 1 | import { getRuntime } from "@yext/pages/util";
 2 | import { SearchHeadlessProvider } from "@yext/search-headless-react";
 3 | import { BrowserRouter } from "react-router-dom";
 4 | import { StaticRouter } from "react-router-dom/server";
 5 | import Locator from "src/components/search/Locator";
 6 | import { getSearchProvider } from "src/config";
 7 | import { SearchPageProfile, TemplateRenderProps } from "src/types/entities";
 8 | import { Template } from "@yext/pages";
 9 | import "src/index.css";
10 | import { Main } from "src/layouts/main";
11 | 
12 | interface SearchLayoutProps {
13 |   data: TemplateRenderProps<SearchPageProfile>;
14 | }
15 | 
16 | const SearchLayout = ({ data }: SearchLayoutProps) => {
17 |   const { document } = data;
18 |   const { c_searchTitle, c_searchSubTitle, c_searchPlaceholderText, _site } =
19 |     document;
20 | 
21 |   const searcher = getSearchProvider(
22 |     YEXT_PUBLIC_SEARCH_EXPERIENCE_API_KEY,
23 |     document.meta.locale,
24 |     document.siteDomain
25 |   );
26 | 
27 |   if (!YEXT_PUBLIC_SEARCH_EXPERIENCE_API_KEY) {
28 |     console.error(
29 |       "Add a search experience API key to the .env file or as a site variable to enable the Locator component."
30 |     );
31 |   }
32 | 
33 |   return (
34 |     <>
35 |       <SearchHeadlessProvider searcher={searcher}>
36 |         <Locator
37 |           title={c_searchTitle || "Find a Location"}
38 |           subTitle={c_searchSubTitle || "Search by city and state or ZIP code"}
39 |           placeholderText={
40 |             c_searchPlaceholderText || "Search by city and state or ZIP code"
41 |           }
42 |         />
43 |       </SearchHeadlessProvider>
44 |     </>
45 |   );
46 | };
47 | 
48 | /**
49 |  * This is the main template. It can have any name as long as it"s the default export.
50 |  * The props passed in here are the direct result from `getStaticProps`.
51 |  */
52 | const Search: Template<TemplateRenderProps<SearchPageProfile>> = (data) => {
53 |   const runtime = getRuntime();
54 | 
55 |   return (
56 |     <Main data={data}>
57 |       {runtime.name === "browser" ? (
58 |         <BrowserRouter>
59 |           <SearchLayout data={data} />
60 |         </BrowserRouter>
61 |       ) : (
62 |         <StaticRouter location="">
63 |           <SearchLayout data={data} />
64 |         </StaticRouter>
65 |       )}
66 |     </Main>
67 |   );
68 | };
69 | 
70 | export default Search;
71 |

 1 | import type {
 2 |   TemplateProps,
 3 |   TemplateRenderProps,
 4 |   GetPath,
 5 |   TemplateConfig,
 6 | } from "@yext/pages";
 7 | import { getRuntime } from "@yext/pages/util";
 8 | import * as fourOhFour from "@yext/components-404";
 9 | import { isProduction } from "@yext/pages/util";
10 | import { Link } from "@yext/pages-components";
11 | 
12 | export const config: TemplateConfig = {
13 |   // The name of the feature. If not set the name of this file will be used (without extension).
14 |   // Use this when you need to override the feature name.
15 |   name: "404",
16 | };
17 | 
18 | /**
19 |  * Defines the path that the generated file will live at for production.
20 |  *
21 |  * NOTE: This currently has no impact on the local dev path. Local dev urls currently
22 |  * take on the form: featureName/entityId
23 |  */
24 | export const getPath: GetPath<TemplateProps> = () => {
25 |   return `404.html`;
26 | };
27 | 
28 | const FourOhFourTemplate = (data: TemplateRenderProps) => {
29 |   const runtime = getRuntime();
30 |   if (runtime.name === "browser") {
31 |     const destinationUrl = `https://${window.location.hostname}/`;
32 |     const isProd = isProduction(data.document.siteDomain);
33 |     const laf = new fourOhFour.LostAndFound(
34 |       window.location.href,
35 |       document.referrer,
36 |       {
37 |         destinationUrl,
38 |         isStaging: !isProd,
39 |         siteDomain: data.document.siteDomain,
40 |       }
41 |     );
42 |     laf.installBasicHooks();
43 |     laf.run();
44 |   }
45 | 
46 |   return (
47 |     <div>
48 |       <p>Sorry, we could not find the URL you were looking for.</p>
49 |       <p>
50 |         If you are not automatically redirected to our homepage,{" "}
51 |         <Link href="/index.html">please click here.</Link>
52 |       </p>
53 |     </div>
54 |   );
55 | };
56 | 
57 | export default FourOhFourTemplate;
58 |
